body: I would love to be Haruto, and get fucked like that by his sensei, and feel that big dick in my ass...

This ero comic were created by one of my absolute favorite shota artists. The first boy reminds me on a very cute boy I recently had a crush on.
I only saw him for a week, but he made me melt from hottnes.
what with that intermission? why a manga has one to begin with, it's not an anime.
I'm so happy that Haruto refused to dress up as a girl
Man, wish it was more of u-hi's stuff
Haruto's so cute... everyone else is so ugly though T-T
